title: CRM Pain Points
content:
{"blocks":[{"id":"ieZSYhoMH4","type":"header","data":{"text":"To Integrate Social Leads into CRM\n\n","level":2}},{"id":"G7Xs27V_2E","type":"list","data":{"style":"ordered","items":["Connect their social media ad accounts (Meta, LinkedIn, Google Ads, etc.)","Automatically receive leads in our CRM"]}},{"id":"cWXen1eJkl","type":"header","data":{"text":"Architecture Overview","level":5}},{"id":"UTy7PzM6qM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Client's Social Media Account (Facebook/LinkedIn/Google)"}},{"id":"wAvGZUHi3e","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[OAuth Authorization] → Your CRM gets access token"}},{"id":"QmciJXlOwe","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[Webhook Subscription] → Platform notifies your CRM of new leads"}},{"id":"TXkVjc2SLZ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[Your CRM Webhook Endpoint] → Receives lead data"}},{"id":"Nqmw0cH1U5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[Lead Processing Engine] → Validates, normalizes, deduplicates"}},{"id":"o3lmCtwiN9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[CRM Database] → Stores lead under client account"}},{"id":"Ta_p2dQHwR","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"[Client Dashboard] → Displays leads + sends notifications"}},{"id":"Y-82TaYb4a","type":"header","data":{"text":"Phase 1: Setup & Prerequisites","level":5}},{"id":"AFqTg29Gv1","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Register Developer Applications(Meta (Facebook & Instagram), LinkedIn, Google Ads)","Deliverable
    App IDs, Secrets and API Credentials for each platform
    Developer Documentation access
"]}},{"id":"i8D1m_7J-R","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"https://www.perplexity.ai/search/first-go-through-with-https-si-J83scyFOTl6kU0WljFqnMw"}},{"id":"AdW_36f5jk","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"provide URL for reference purpose"}}]}

title: PRD For  WhatsApp Flow Builder
content:
{"blocks":[{"id":"e8izmgYW6m","type":"header","data":{"text":"1. Overview","level":3}},{"id":"EgVGkrevYz","type":"header","data":{"text":"1.1 Purpose","level":4}},{"id":"S4zrL4M6Ia","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The WhatsApp Flow Builder allows users to visually design, configure, and automate message journeys for WhatsApp communication.
It enables users to create multi-step message flows using a drag-and-drop interface — including text messages, media, templates, product lists, and quick-reply buttons — without writing code."}},{"id":"rPQQyh5g4P","type":"header","data":{"text":"1.2 Objective","level":4}},{"id":"MlszWAtvt9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"To provide an intuitive, no-code interface where users can build and manage WhatsApp automation flows for use cases such as onboarding, booking confirmations, promotions, feedback collection, and customer support."}},{"id":"wi96nb23Pt","type":"header","data":{"text":"1.3 Target Users","level":4}},{"id":"L7TjJR2gTZ","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Marketing Teams
","Customer Support Teams
","Operations Managers
","System Admins managing WhatsApp Business Communication
"]}},{"id":"P-jwck-SIJ","type":"header","data":{"text":"1.4 Success Metrics","level":4}},{"id":"8fVtzDfUWl","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Reduce flow creation time by 60% compared to manual setup.
","Achieve <2% configuration error rate in published flows.
",">90% user satisfaction score for flow usability.
"]}},{"id":"QaLjv4mPtg","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"37HiwKvn0R","type":"header","data":{"text":"2. Scope","level":3}},{"id":"g0K_7spL5M","type":"header","data":{"text":"In Scope","level":4}},{"id":"hsIv-dpxaf","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Visual flow builder canvas
","Drag-and-drop message nodes
","WhatsApp message type configuration (text, media, template, product, list)
","Node linking and logical branching
","Flow start triggers based on keywords
","Save, edit, delete, and preview functionality
","WhatsApp API integration for testing flows
"]}},{"id":"QuW2mnhMct","type":"header","data":{"text":"Out of Scope","level":4}},{"id":"8KLSLp0e16","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Flow analytics (future enhancement)
","Multi-user simultaneous editing
","AI-based flow recommendations
"]}},{"id":"DK4Kdbmkev","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"z3CUNhYZi5","type":"header","data":{"text":"3. Key Features & Requirements","level":3}},{"id":"1mLPnDJ9Yb","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.1 Flow Canvas","level":4}},{"id":"mvVi9a_7fu","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Interactive grid layout for organizing nodes.
","Zoom in/out and pan capabilities.
","Supports connection lines between nodes to define message sequence.
","Auto-align feature to maintain visual clarity.
"]}},{"id":"PxHRrdLwtQ","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.2 Left Panel: Message Types","level":4}},{"id":"7NT9lpe7__","type":"table","data":{"withHeadings":true,"content":[["Message Type","Description","Key Configurations"],["Text Button","Simple message with quick-reply buttons","Message text, up to 3 buttons"],["Media Button","Message with image/video and CTA buttons","Media type (Image/Video), media URL, buttons"],["List Message","Displays list of options for selection","List title, description, items"],["Catalogue Message","Showcase of multiple products","Product list, pricing, URLs"],["Single Product","One product detail message","Product name, image, price"],["Multi Product","Multiple products carousel","Up to 10 product items"],["Template","Pre-approved WhatsApp templates","Template name, parameters"]]}},{"id":"1315x4_vsD","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.3 Flow Start Node","level":4}},{"id":"j4tABR15yM","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["First node in every flow; accepts user keywords or triggers.
","User can define multiple keywords.
","Option to define case sensitivity or regex pattern match.
"]}},{"id":"lRFWoBOx5m","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.4 Message Configuration","level":4}},{"id":"7Ed-Z87jEG","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Each message node should allow:"}},{"id":"9IaFpfGK2_","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Editing message text/content
","Adding up to 3 buttons or actions
","Linking buttons to other nodes
","Uploading or linking media (images, videos, GIFs)
","Deleting or cloning message nodes
"]}},{"id":"UMne25oyKs","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.5 Node Linking","level":4}},{"id":"ept9BMFG3g","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Users can connect nodes visually via connectors.
","Each button can link to one next node.
","System should validate for broken or circular connections before saving.
"]}},{"id":"D5fful6Oeu","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.6 Controls & Actions","level":4}},{"id":"UJmngU-TNh","type":"table","data":{"withHeadings":true,"content":[["Action","Description"],["Save Changes","Saves current flow structure and configurations"],["Fallback & Intents","Opens modal to set default or error messages"],["Active/Inactive Toggle","Controls whether flow is live or in draft"],["Undo/Redo","Allows reverting or reapplying recent actions"],["Zoom","Canvas zoom in/out for better view"],["Rename Flow","Editable flow title field"]]}},{"id":"U3KQmgLEWF","type":"header","data":{"text":"3.7 Integration","level":4}},{"id":"SGRyIoL9QM","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["On publish, flow should generate JSON for WhatsApp API consumption.
","Flow should trigger correctly when tested via sandbox WhatsApp number.
","Each node’s message content should map correctly to WhatsApp’s message schema.
"]}},{"id":"fBN6n779bc","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"vdZfbBnLFl","type":"header","data":{"text":"4. User Flow","level":3}},{"id":"mcNFpsjwjJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1️⃣ Create Flow:
User clicks “New Flow” → “Flow Builder”
"}},{"id":"Suw6eDFEFv","type":"header","data":{"text":"↓
","level":2}},{"id":"U1tH3kmAut","type":"header","data":{"text":"2️⃣ Add Flow Start Node:
Define keywords to trigger the flow.","level":6}},{"id":"gRu127DOs4","type":"header","data":{"text":"
↓
","level":2}},{"id":"xGcwR10nhq","type":"header","data":{"text":"3️⃣ Add Message Nodes:
Drag message types from left panel → configure content.
","level":6}},{"id":"Qe4ZhbXFyq","type":"header","data":{"text":"↓
","level":2}},{"id":"csNzjLDGfc","type":"header","data":{"text":"4️⃣ Link Messages:
Connect nodes visually using lines.
","level":6}},{"id":"yBhHSTFfpO","type":"header","data":{"text":"↓
","level":2}},{"id":"mzPRWwwHCV","type":"header","data":{"text":"5️⃣ Save and Activate:
Click “Save Changes” → Toggle to Active.
","level":6}},{"id":"Aa5JBiGF0I","type":"header","data":{"text":"↓
","level":2}},{"id":"CboBGGHJza","type":"header","data":{"text":"6️⃣ Test Flow:
Use WhatsApp sandbox to send keyword and verify automation sequence.","level":6}},{"id":"1kWs8wJV_e","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"aksNJeQhxv","type":"header","data":{"text":"5. Functional Requirements","level":3}},{"id":"3FupJz18FK","type":"table","data":{"withHeadings":true,"content":[["ID","Requirement","Priority","Type"],["FR1","System shall allow users to create a new flow and name it","High","Functional"],["FR2","System shall support drag-and-drop message components","High","UI/Functional"],["FR3","System shall display all message types in left sidebar","High","UI"],["FR4","System shall allow adding keywords in Flow Start node","High","Functional"],["FR5","System shall allow connecting nodes via visual connectors","High","Functional"],["FR6","System shall validate flow completeness before saving","High","Functional"],["FR7","System shall allow zoom in/out and pan on canvas","Medium","UI"],["FR8","System shall persist flow data on save","High","Functional"],["FR9","System shall allow enabling/disabling flows","Medium","Functional"],["FR10","System shall support WhatsApp API trigger test","High","Integration"]]}},{"id":"Kbj-e4CI5H","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"mh90MIBDK7","type":"header","data":{"text":"6. Non-Functional Requirements","level":3}},{"id":"s5OAoe4qOk","type":"table","data":{"withHeadings":true,"content":[["Category","Requirement"],["Performance","Flow canvas should load within 3 seconds"],["Scalability","Must handle up to 200 connected nodes"],["Security","Flow data must be user-isolated and authenticated"],["Usability","Drag-drop accuracy and smooth transitions"],["Reliability","99.9% uptime for flow saving and execution"],["Compatibility","Works on Chrome, Edge, Safari latest versions"]]}},{"id":"UinFwFEF-t","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"ulqtsclsH-","type":"header","data":{"text":"7. UI / UX Requirements","level":3}},{"id":"aW7YsBrvWJ","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Left panel shows message types and actions (scrollable list).
","Central canvas grid with drag, zoom, and pan.
","Each node has card-style UI with clear icons and connection points.
","Top-right controls for Save, Activate, Fallback & Intents.
","Visual feedback for invalid nodes or unsaved changes.
"]}},{"id":"RQcAdPR7Qn","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"yqsH__0lid","type":"header","data":{"text":"8. Error Handling","level":3}},{"id":"a6Eail6exa","type":"table","data":{"withHeadings":true,"content":[["Error Scenario","Expected Handling"],["Missing node connection","Show alert “Incomplete connection”"],["Duplicate keyword","Highlight error in Flow Start node"],["Invalid media URL","Show preview error and disable save"],["API failure on save","Retry mechanism with user notification"],["Unauthorized access","Redirect to login page"]]}},{"id":"W0k_wHP5dr","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"RJ8CCqOR-B","type":"header","data":{"text":"9. Dependencies","level":3}},{"id":"jr73eAPAFn","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["WhatsApp Business API or sandbox environment
","Backend Flow Service (for save/load/publish)
","Media storage (AWS S3 or similar)
","Auth & user management
"]}},{"id":"6qB9pZGeJQ","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"63yiE7K0TB","type":"header","data":{"text":"10. Assumptions","level":3}},{"id":"A4Dqumd1xJ","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Users already have WhatsApp Business API access.
","Flow Builder operates in desktop browsers.
","Template approval handled externally via Meta.
"]}},{"id":"I-nbooHrSz","type":"delimiter","data":{}},{"id":"LUG7HB2xK5","type":"header","data":{"text":"11. Future Enhancements","level":3}},{"id":"RrJd0UH1ho","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Flow analytics dashboard
","Version history and rollback
","Multi-user real-time collaboration
","AI-assisted flow generation"]}}]}

title: Passsbook
